description:
Bankers Toolbox never sleeps on crime.
We're starting to learn that someone is running a major crime ring in the area.
Help us figure out who it is, and how they're pulling it off - All with the power of Banker's amazing software!

1.info: The Casino. A classic place for a heist. Assuming of course that you don't willingly hand them all of your money first.

2.info: Some are dirty, some are nice, better watch out for that faulty card reader - or it'll take your money twice.

3.info: If the website says you can get 100% authentic UGGS 99% off and you end up ordering every pair twice - you might be vulnerable to online shopping scams.

4.info: Come dirty - leave clean! Or, as an anonymous High School teacher in New Mexico puts it: "Have an A1 Day!"

5.info: Web Hacker extraordinaire. He has the power to cripple your home network or steal every cent from your bank account. But he mostly spends his time on the finer things in life. Those cat memes don't create themselves!

6.info: "She's so obviously guilty, like, OMG... we can stop looking because we found her" - Sara Scammer

7.info: Definitely a member of the mob, according to Will R. who found 100 pirated copies of The Godfather on his hard drive. Why? Will lost interest before finding out.

8.info: I'm sorry - but we can't accept your money due to the fact it's covered in... mud? We'll go with mud. Please launder this money before paying with it

9.info: So if I click on this button, I'll have $1 Million dollars deposited in my account? Sign me up!

10.info: If you could hold off depositing that $1.4B check I gave you until tomorrow, that'd be great.

11.info: What is this? A Micro Structure for Ants!?!? The Micro Structure has to be at least... 3 times bigger than this!

12.info: They'll polish your nails and your money. No matter how cracked and broken - the Nail Salon will fix you('re money) up right!

13.info: Hello!?... Hello!?!? I can't see anyone - this web is too dark ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

14.info: When that credit card swipe feels soooo smooth, it has to be illegal.

15.info:
"I'll give you $11001000 for that lawn furniture."

"No way! It's worth at least $0x1F4"

16.info: "Sara's great! A real nice person, she's so great to have around the office.... Can you tell me when she stops listening in on this convo to hear what I'm saying about her?" - Martin

17.info: Michelle and her husband just bought a car wash in New Mexico! They're so proud. I hear its doing so well they might open another! Good for them.

18.info: Yelp reviewer by day, con artist by night
